definition[0]: Monday, 19 October 1987, the day on which share prices on the stock exchange suddenly fell by a large amount, and many people lost a lot of money
definition[1]: Monday, 28 October 1929, the day on which share prices on the Stock Exchange suddenly fell by a large amount, leading to the Great Depression of the 1930s
definition[2]: Monday October 28,1929, when prices on the New York Stock Exchange fell by a very large amount during the wall street crash
definition[3]: Monday October 19,1987, when prices fell by a very large amount on the New York Stock Exchange, and on other stock markets around the world
definition[4]: any Monday when something bad happens
